original: punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ kañcitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mantramukhacaryācārī imāṃ bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasatvasya sarvatayāgatajñāna kāyasya () jñānamūrtera hayaparamārthī nāma- saṃgītiṃ nāmacūḍāmaṇiṃ sakalaparisamāptāmanyūnāmakhaṇḍāmebhireva padavyañjanaiḥ pratyahama- khaṇḍa ) trikālaṃ ' ) dhāraviṣyati vācaviṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśomanasikariṣyati ||
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ kañcid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā mantra mukha caryā cārī imām bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñāna satvasya sarva tayā āgata jñāna kāyasya jñāna mūrteḥ
parebhyaḥ ca yathā yogyataḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyati

original: pratyekaṃ cānyatamānyatamanāmārthe mojñāna- kāyamālambīkṛtya ekāgramānaso bhāvaviṣyati ||
analyzed: pratyekam ca anyatama anyatama nāma arthe kāyam ālambīkṛtya ekāgra mānasaḥ

original: śradhimuktikatatvamanaskārābhyāṃ samatta- mukhavihāravihārī sarvadhamaprativedhikayā paramayā śranāvilayā prajñānuvidyayā śraddhayā sama- nvāgataḥ saṃstasya tryadhānadhasamaṅginaḥ sarvabudda bodhisattvāḥ samāgamya saṃgamya sarvadharmamukhānyu- padarśayiṣyati ||
analyzed: nvāgataḥ san tasya tri adha anadha samaṅginaḥ sarva buddha bodhisattvāḥ samāgamya saṃgamya sarva dharma mukhāni upadarśayiṣyati
śrātma bhāvam ca upadarśayiṣyati

original: udāttadamakāñca mahākrodharājāno mahā- vajradharādayo jagatparitrāṇabhūtā nānānirmāṇātrapa kāyairojovalaṃ tejo'pradhṛṣyatāṃ ||
analyzed: udātta damakāḥ ca mahā krodha rājānaḥ mahā vajradhara ādayaḥ jagat paritrāṇa bhūtāḥ kāyaiḥ ojaḥ valam pradhṛṣyatām
maṇḍalāni upadarśayiṣyati

original: śeṣāñca mantravidyā rājyaḥ sarvavighnavināyaka- mārāṇāṃ mahāpratyaṅgirā mahāparājitāḥ sarātriṃdivaṃ pratikṣaṇāṃ sarveryapitheṣu rakṣāvaraṇa guptiṃ kariṣyati ||
analyzed: śeṣān ca mantra vidyāḥ rājyaḥ sarva vighna vināyaka mārāṇām mahā pratyaṅgirāḥ mahā parājitāḥ sa rātriṃdivam pratikṣaṇām sarva īrya pitheṣu rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyati
sarva buddha bodhisattva adhiṣṭhānam kariṣyati
sarva kāya vāc manobhiḥ tasya saṃtāne samyak adhiṣṭhā āspatti
sarva buddha bodhisattva anugraheṇa ca anugrahīṣyanti
sarva dharmāṇām vaiśāracam tasya pratibhānam tat ca uṣasaṃhariṣyati
sarva arhat śrāvaka pratyekabuddha ārya dharma prema āśaya tayā
nāma saṃgi iti
bhāvam ca upadarśayiṣyati

original: ye ca brahmendropendra rudranārāyaṇāsanatkumāra maheśvara kārtikeya - mahākālanandikeśvaramavaruṇā kuvera hārītīdaśadiglokapālāca satata samitaṃ rātriṃ divaṃ gacchatastiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya niṣaṇasya svapato jāyataḥ ) samāhitasyāsamā hitasya ca ekākino bahuvanamadhyagatasya ca yāvadrāmanagaranigamānapada ra rāṣṭra rājadhānīmadhyagatasye- kīlarathyāpratolīnagara hāvī bīcavara śṛṅgāṭaka nagara tira pieyaśālāmadhyagatasya yāvacchūnyāgaragirikandaranadīcanaganopagatasya ) ||
analyzed: ye ca brahma indra upendra rudra nārāyaṇa sanatkumāra maheśvara kārtikeya mahākāla nandikeśvara mavaruṇā kuvera hārītī daśa diś lokapālāḥ ca satata samitam rātrim divam gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ

original: ucchiṣṭasyānucchiṣṭasya mattasya pramattasya sarvadā sarvathā sarvaprakāraṃ () ca parāṃ rakṣāvaraṇa guptiṃ kariṣyati ||
analyzed: ucchiṣṭasya an ucchiṣṭasya mattasya pramattasya sarvadā sarvathā sarvaprakāram ca parām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyati
ratriṃdivam param svastyayanam kariṣyati

original: ye cānye devanāgayajñagandharvī suragaruḍa kiṃnara mahoragā manu- ṣyāmanuṣyāśca ye cānye grahanakṣatramātṛgaṇapatayo yāśca sapta mātaro yāca pakṣiṇīrākṣasī- piśācyastāḥ sarvāḥ sahitāḥ samayāḥ sasainyāḥ sāparivārāḥ sānucarā: , sarve te rakṣāvara- guptiṃ kariṣyati ||
analyzed: ye ca anye ye ca anye ye ca anye graha nakṣatra mātṛ gaṇapatayaḥ yāḥ ca sapta mātaraḥ yāḥ ca pakṣiṇī rākṣasī piśācyaḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ sahitāḥ samayāḥ sa sainyāḥ sa aparivārāḥ sa

original: paraṃ ca tasya kāye monobalaṃ prapsyati ||
analyzed: param ca tasya kāye monaḥ balam prapsyati
śrārogya balam āyuḥ vṛddhim ca upasaṃhariṣyati
caturtha cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā tad padāni ekonaviṃśatiḥ

original: punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara ya imāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ nāmacūḍāmaṇiṃ pratyahamakhaṇḍasamādāna- tastriḥ kṛtvā kaṇṭhagatāmāvartayiṣyati ) ||
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ imām nāma saṃgītim nāma cūḍāmaṇim pratyaham akhaṇḍa samādāna kṛtvā kaṇṭha gatām āvartayiṣyati
pustaka gatām vā paṭhamānaḥ pravartayiṣyati
bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñānasatvasya upamā ālamvayan anuvicittayan tad rūpam anudhyāyan

original: tameva pakāye- nācirādeva dharmavinayamupādāya yaha kṣati ) gaganatalagatīśca sarvabudda bodhisatvānnāনানি- rmāṇānūpakāyaiḥ sahagatāndrakṣati ||
analyzed: tam eva na acirāt eva dharma vinayam upādāya gagana tala gatīḥ ca sarva budda bodhisatvān na ṛmāṇa anūpa kāyaiḥ sahagatān drakṣati

original: na tasya mahāsattvasya jātu kadācitkathamapi durga- tyapāyapatanaṃ ca bhaviṣyati ||

original: śraśrutapūrvāṇi ca tasya śilpakalābhi- jñājñānaśāstrāṇi cārthato grandhataśca pratibhāsamāgamiṣyanti ||

original: evaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara śraprameyaguṇasamanvāgato 'sau mantramukhacaryācārī bhaviṣyati ||
analyzed: evam vajrapāṇe vajradhara sau mantra mukha caryā cārī bhaviṣyati
śranyaiḥ śāprameyaiḥ evaṃprakāre revaṃjātīyaiḥ guṇa gaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: cirādeva vajra- pāṇo vajradhara paramārthānāmasaṃgītisaṃdhārakaḥ puruṣapuṃgavaḥ susaṃbhṛtapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ kṣipra- taraṃ buddaguṇānsamudānīyānuttarāṃ samyaka saṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate ||
analyzed: cirāt eva vajra pāṇo vajradhara parama artha anāma saṃgīti saṃdhārakaḥ puruṣa puṃgavaḥ su saṃbhṛta puṇya jñāna saṃbhāraḥ kṣipra taram buddha guṇān samudānīya anuttarām samyaka saṃbodhim

original: śranalpakalyāṇaparini- vāpādharmaḥ sarvasatvānāmanuttaradharma deśako 'dhiṣṭhito daśadiksa harmanḍa bhirdharmarāna iti ||
analyzed: sarva satvānām anuttara dharma deśakaḥ dhiṣṭhitaḥ daśa diś sa harmanḍa bhiḥ dharmarānaḥ iti
ṣaṣṭha cakrasya anuśaṃsā tad padāni aprameyāṇi

original: sarvadharmābhāvasvabhāva viśuddavatra śra śrā śraḥ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ sarvadharma yaḍata sarvatathāgatajñāna kāyamañju- śrīpariśuddhatāmupādāyeti ||
analyzed: prakṛti pariśuddhāḥ sarva sarva tathāgata jñāna kāyamañju śrī pariśuddha tām upādāya iti
śrāḥ sarva tathāgata hṛdaya hara hara

original: śrī~ ha~ hrīḥ bhagavanjñānamūrte vāgīśvara mahāvāca sarvadharmaga- ganāmalasupariśuddhadharmadhātujñānagarbha śrāḥ ||
analyzed: śrī ha hrīḥ bhagavan jñāna mūrte vāc īśvara mahā vāca sarva dharma ga ga nāmala su pariśuddha dharmadhātu jñāna garbha śrāḥ
mantra vinyāśaḥ

original: ya vajradharaḥ śrīmāṃ hṛṣṭatuṣṭaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ praṇāmya nāthaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ || 1 ||
analyzed: vajradharaḥ hṛṣṭa tuṣṭaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ praṇāmya nātham saṃbuddham bhagavantam tathāgatam
tad padāni ekapañcāśat

original: imasī vajrapāṇe vajradharetyārabhya yāvarmarāja ityetāḥ pañcānuśaṃsā ekīkatya | || nāmasaṃgīti ||
analyzed: imasī vajrapāṇe vajradhara iti ārabhya yā arma rājaḥ iti etāḥ pañca anuśaṃsāḥ ekīkatya
śranyaiḥ ca bahuvidhaiḥ nādhaiḥ guhya indraiḥ vajrapāṇibhiḥ sa sārdham krodha rājanaiḥ provāca uccais idam vacaḥ

original: numodāma nātha sādhu sādhu subhāṣitaṃ | kṛto 'smākaṃ mahānarthaḥ samyaka saṃbodhiprāpakaḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: numodāma nātha sādhu sādhu subhāṣitam kṛtaḥ smākam mahān arthaḥ samyaka saṃbodhi prāpakaḥ

original: jagataścāpyanāthasya vimuktiphalakāṅkṣiṇaḥ | śreyo mārgo viśuddho 'yaṃ māyājāla nayoditaḥ || 4 ||
analyzed: jagataḥ ca api anāthasya vimukti phala kāṅkṣiṇaḥ śreyaḥ mārgaḥ viśuddhaḥ yam māyā jāla naya uditaḥ

original: gambhīrodāravaipulyo mahārtho jagadakṛt | buddhānāṃ viṣayo hyeṣa samyaka saṃbuddhabhāṣitaḥ || 5 ||
analyzed: gambhīra udāra vaipulyaḥ mahārthaḥ buddhānām viṣayaḥ hi eṣa samyaka saṃbuddha bhāṣitaḥ
iti upasaṃvhāra gāthāḥ pañca

original: śrāryamāyājālā ṣoḍaśasāhasrikāma vhāyogatatrāntaḥpātisamādhijñālapaṭalādbhagavattathāga- taśākyamunibhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrājñānasatvasya paramārthā nāmasaṃgītiḥ parisamāptā ||
analyzed: śrā ārya māyā jālā bhagavat tathāgata śākya muni bhāṣitā bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñānasatvasya parama arthā nāma saṃgītiḥ parisamāptā

original: śra śrā i ī u ū e ai mro yo yaḥ sthito hṛdi jñānamūrtira he buddho buddhānāṃ tryadhava- rtināṃ śro~ vajratīkṣṇa duḥkhaccheda prajñājñānamūrtaye jñānakāyavāgīśrara racanāya te namaḥ ||
analyzed: śra śrā i ī u ū e yaḥ yaḥ sthitaḥ hṛdi he buddhaḥ buddhānām tri adha va rtinām śro vajratīkṣṇa duḥkha cheda prajñā jñāna mūrtaye racanāya te namaḥ
maṅgalam bhavatu
nāma saṃgi iti

original: iyamasau vatrapaṇe vatradhara bhagavato jñānamūrteḥ sarvatathāgatajñānakāvasya mañjuśrījñā- nasatvasyāveṇikapariśuddhā nāmasaṃgītistavānuttara prītiprasādama vhodvilyasaṃjñananārthakarī sarvavyādhimahābhayapraśamanakarī pavitratarā pavitratarāṇāṃ ||
analyzed: iyam asau vatrapaṇe vatradhara bhagavataḥ jñānamūrteḥ sarva tathāgata jñāna kāvasya mañjuśrī jñā na satvasya āveṇika pariśuddhā nāma saṃgītiḥ tava anuttara sarva vyādhi mahā bhaya praśamana
dhanyatarāḥ dhanyatarāṇām sarvam
ṅgalam māṅgalyānām vajrapāṇe

original: śaraṇaṃ śaraṇārthināṃ layanaṃ layanārthināṃ trāṇaṃ trāṇā- thināṃ parāyaṇaṃ parāyaṇārthināṃ ||
analyzed: śaraṇam śaraṇa arthinām layanam layana arthinām trāṇam trāṇā thinām parāyaṇam parāyaṇa arthinām
dīpa bhūtāḥ pārthinām agatikānām śranuttara gatiḥ
suga tānām bhava samudra pāra gāminām mahā bhaiṣajya rāja bhūtā
sarvatamaḥ ndhakāra kudṛṣṭi apanayanāya cittā maṇi rāja bhūtā
sarva satva payā āśaya abhiprāya paripūraṇāya sarvajña jñāna bhūtā
pañca cakṣuṣpratilambhā ṣaṣ pāramitā paripūritā

original: punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara imāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ nāma cūḍāmaṇiṃ pratya- hama usamādānataḥ triṣkāraṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhagatāmāvartayiṣyati pustakagatāṃ paṭhamānaḥ pratra- rtayiṣyati ||
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradharaḥ imām nāmasaṃgītim nāma cūḍāmaṇim triṣkāram kṛtvā kaṇṭha gatām āvartayiṣyati pustaka gatām paṭhamānaḥ pratra rtayiṣyati

original: punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe na ca nocakulopapannā na ca vikalendriyāśca bhaviṣyatti na hīnendriyāśca jāyante kintu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyate ||
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe na ca noca kula upapannāḥ na ca vikala indriyāḥ ca na hīna indriyāḥ ca jāyante kintu buddhakṣetreṣu upapadyate
na ca durbhikṣa roga śāstrāttara kalpeṣu upapayyante
punar aparam vatra paṇe vatra dhara śraprameya guṇa samanvāgataḥ ca bhaviṣyati
gataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇa iyaṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ dhārayati vācayati pāṭhapati pravartayati ||
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇaḥ iyam nāma saṃgītim dhārayati vācayati pāṭhapati pravartayati
śranuśaṃsā stutiḥ
